column4: Geforce4 420 Go won't do XGL/AIGXL/Compiz/Beryl....at least I couldn't get it to work. So evertyhing Nvidia isn't just a walk in the park....
what version of ubuntu?
edgy
and you used nvidia-glx from repos?
nvidia-glx-legacy
no you need nvidia-glx geforce4 cards in edgy are supported with -glx package
seriously? everyone told me i had to get the legacy-stuff....:s
for feisty you do for edgy the glx drivers should work fine. what card is it?
still the Geforce4 420 Go ;)
did you try the legacy drivers from beryl repo?
don't know.....i guess i used the ubuntu repo....
please join #ubuntu-effects and read the edgy guide in /topic
ubuntus legacy drivers dont support opengl
so i should try with the beryl repo?
yes
read the guide it will give you name of package and how to isntall it
just to clarify...you're ABSOLUTELY certain that beryl will work with the nvidia-glx? i'm about to reinstall....YET again....:s
there is no promise beryl will work at all
im not sure what version your card needs. read the topic in #ubuntu-effects for more info.
still no dice. :S
my xorg.conf at least shows that it uses the correct card/driver.....but when I restart gdm, i get an errormessage as follows: "Fatal error: no screens found"
